lead_paragraph: The two revel in Los Angeles disco history by day, and the dad stalks by night in this midnight-movie-esque work from Jim Hosking.

headline.main: Review: ‘The Greasy Strangler’ Pairs Father and Son in Tours and Gore

snippet: The two revel in Los Angeles disco history by day, and the dad stalks by night in this midnight-movie-esque work from Jim Hosking....
abstract: Andy Webster reviews movie The Greasy Strangler, directed by Jim Hosking.
